# ContentViewMinimumHeight

**Property List Key**

An integer that specifies the minimum height of the floating window.

## Attributes

- **ContentViewMinimumWidth**: An integer that specifies the minimum width of the floating window.

items.description: An integer that specifies the minimum width of the floating window.
items.name: ContentViewMinimumWidth
